Flow.description: GDPR opt in process. Opts all marketing contact preference fields to in or out depending on the GDPR Opt In value

value.stringValue: AND( [Account].IsPersonAccount = TRUE, [Account].GDPR_Opt_In__c = TRUE, OR( ISCHANGED([Account].GDPR_Modified__c), AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK([Account].GDPR_Modified__c )) )))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_6
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.IsPersonAccount} = TRUE, {!myVariable_current.GDPR_Opt_In__c} = TRUE, OR( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.GDPR_Modified__c}), AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.GDPR_Modified__c} )) )))

value.stringValue: AND( [Account].IsPersonAccount = TRUE, [Account].GDPR_Opt_In__c = FALSE, OR( ISCHANGED([Account].GDPR_Modified__c), AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK([Account].GDPR_Modified__c )) )))

formulas.name: formula_myRule_8
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.IsPersonAccount} = TRUE, {!myVariable_current.GDPR_Opt_In__c} = FALSE, OR( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.GDPR_Modified__c}), AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.GDPR_Modified__c} )) )))

Flow.label: Student Opt In / Out Process
